tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE supply_chain_financial_reports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    cost_data DECIMAL,
    revenue_data DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE supply_chain_costs (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  cost_type VARCHAR(255),
  cost_amount DECIMAL,
  cost_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE revenue_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  revenue_type VARCHAR(255),
  revenue_amount DECIMAL,
  revenue_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE financial_reports (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  report_name VARCHAR(255),
  report_date DATE,
  total_cost DECIMAL,
  total_revenue DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE integration_logs (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  log_type VARCHAR(255),
  log_description TEXT,
  log_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)
